001package edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.service;
002
003import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.model.entity.Apod;
004import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
005import java.time.LocalDate;
006import java.util.List;
007import retrofit2.http.GET;
008import retrofit2.http.Query;
009
010public interface ApodProxyService {
011
012  @GET("apod")
013  Single<List<Apod>> getDateRange(
014      @Query("start_date") LocalDate startDate,
015      @Query("end_date") LocalDate endDate,
016      @Query("api_key") String apiKey);
017
018  @GET("apod")
019  Single<Apod> getToday(
020      @Query("api_key") String apiKey);
021
022  @GET("apod")
023  Single<List<Apod>> getOpenDateRange(
024      @Query("start_date") LocalDate startDate,
025      @Query("api_key") String apiKey);
026
027  @GET("apod")
028  Single<List<Apod>> getRandomApods(
029      @Query("count") int count, // Number of random APODs
030      @Query("api_key") String apiKey);
031
032  @GET("apod")
033  Single<Apod> getRandomApod(
034      @Query("api_key") String apiKey);
035
036  @GET("apod")
037  Single<List<Apod>> getSpecificDateAcrossYears(
038      @Query("start_date") LocalDate startDate,
039      @Query("end_date") LocalDate endDate,
040      @Query("api_key") String apiKey); // Fetch APODs for a specific date across all years
041
042}
